title: Developing 21st-Century Competencies Through STEAM-Integrated Mathematics Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic skills and experience using everyday digital tools
context.additional_context: Designs customized STEAM activities for adult learners, focusing on math-integrated projects centered on solving real-life problems

learning_goals: By engaging in STEAM projects, learners enhance collaborative skills by applying three or more collaboration strategies during mathematical problem-solving.
Learners can propose two or more creative ideas when solving everyday problems using the engineering design process.
Learners can document logical reasoning processes across three or more stages in mathematical modeling activities using digital fabrication tools (e.g., 3D modeling software).

resources: Recycled Materials Set for Everyday Problem Solving
Whiteboard and Sticky Notes for Collaborative Learning

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
